description: Monitor Server Using Live PerfMon Metrics

panels.title: WhoIsActive Data - Latest Captured - FILTERED - @ ${whoisactive_collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}
What's Running - [sp_WhoIsActive] - DBA Maintenance - Workload  @ ${whoisactive_collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}
What's Running - [sp_WhoIsActive] - SQL Server Agent Jobs @ ${whoisactive_collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}
Long Running Queries - WhoIsActive Data   @ ${whoisactive_collection_time_utc:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH.mm}
What was Running - sp_WhoIsActive - All Sessions - For Duration

list.definition:
select distinct srvname = sql_instance from dbo.instance_details with (nolock)
where is_available = 1
list.label: Sql Instance
list.name: server
list.query:
select distinct srvname = sql_instance from dbo.instance_details with (nolock)
where is_available = 1

list.label: Database
list.name: database

list.label: Is Local SQL Instance
list.name: is_local

list.description: Threshold duration in minutes for Long Running Queries
list.label: Duration (Min)
list.name: duration

list.label: IP Address
list.name: ip

list.label: Host Name
list.name: host_name

list.label: Fully Qualified Domain Name
list.name: fqdn

list.definition:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
select top 1 collection_time_utc
from [$inventory_db].dbo.vw_performance_counters
where host_name = '$host_name'
order by collection_time_utc desc
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

--IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
if ($is_local = 1)
  EXEC (@sql);
ELSE
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];
list.label: Collection Time UTC
list.name: collection_time_utc
list.query:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
DECLARE @sql varchar(max) = "
select top 1 collection_time_utc
from [$inventory_db].dbo.vw_performance_counters
where host_name = '$host_name'
order by collection_time_utc desc
"
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

--IF ('$server' = SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName'))
if ($is_local = 1)
  EXEC (@sql);
ELSE
  EXEC (@sql) AT [$server];

list.label: WhoIsActive Collection Time UTC
list.name: whoisactive_collection_time_utc

list.label: DBA Database
list.name: dba_db

title: WhoIsActive - SQL Server Queries - Workload
